title: [Large-Scale] Behavioral Engagement Enhancement Program for Online Science Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Program for learners over 40 requiring asynchronous self-directed learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with continuous feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can perform the scientific inquiry process (problem definition-hypothesis formulation-experiment design-result analysis) with 80% accuracy using VR simulations within three weeks
Learners voluntarily access online learning platforms at least three times per week for four weeks and write inquiry activity reports (minimum 500 characters)
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply self-directed learning strategies by achieving 75+ points (out of 100) on mid-formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
